org.theospi.portfolio.shared.model.impl

Class GenericXmlRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.theospi.portfolio.shared.model.impl.GenericXmlRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PresentableObjectHome

    public class GenericXmlRenderer
extends Object
implements PresentableObjectHome
    This class renders an object into an xml object. This implementation uses bean introspection to navigate the object model and convert into a jdom model. In relies on the objectStructure xml file to specify which properties to traverse. The prevents circlular references from being traversed. Valid values for type attribute are: collection, artifact, object. If not specified object is assumed.
